SEARCH
Package com.kraken.krakenhax

Class EventViewModel

java.lang.Object
androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
com.kraken.krakenhax.EventViewModel
public class EventViewModel extends androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel
ViewModel for managing event data. Handles Firestore interactions and business logic.

  • Method Details

    • addEvent

      public void addEvent(Event event)
      Adds an event to the local list and uploads it to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to add and upload

    • uploadPosterForEvent

      public void uploadPosterForEvent(Event event, android.net.Uri filePath)
      Uploads a poster image for an event and updates its Firestore document.
      Parameters:
      event - the event whose poster is being uploaded
      filePath - the URI of the poster image file

    • generateQR

      public android.graphics.Bitmap generateQR(String eventId) throws com.google.zxing.WriterException
      Generates a QR code bitmap for the given event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - the ID of the event to encode in the QR code
      Returns:
      a bitmap containing the generated QR code
      Throws:
      com.google.zxing.WriterException - if the QR code cannot be generated

    • uploadQrCode

      public void uploadQrCode(Event event, android.graphics.Bitmap qrCodeBitmap, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<android.net.Uri> onSuccessListener)
      Uploads a QR code image to Firebase Storage and updates the event document.
      Parameters:
      event - the event whose QR code is being uploaded
      qrCodeBitmap - the QR code bitmap to upload
      onSuccessListener - callback invoked with the download URI on success

    • urlToBitmap

      public void urlToBitmap(android.content.Context context, String url)
      Downloads an image from the given URL and stores it as a bitmap.
      Parameters:
      context - the context used for loading resources
      url - the URL of the image to download

    • clearDownloadedBitmap

      public void clearDownloadedBitmap()
      Clears the currently downloaded bitmap.

    • getDownloadedBitmap

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<android.graphics.Bitmap> getDownloadedBitmap()
      Returns live data containing the last downloaded bitmap.
      Returns:
      mutable live data holding the downloaded bitmap

    • getEventList

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<ArrayList<Event>> getEventList()
      Returns the live list of all events.
      Returns:
      mutable live data containing the current list of events

    • getQrCode

      public androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<android.graphics.Bitmap> getQrCode()
      Returns the live data holding the generated QR code bitmap.
      Returns:
      mutable live data containing the last generated QR code

    • setQrCode

      public void setQrCode(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      Sets the current QR code bitmap value.
      Parameters:
      bitmap - the QR code bitmap to set

      Uploads an event document to Firestore.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to upload

    • addSnapshotListener

      private void addSnapshotListener()
      Real-time Firestore listener for events.

    • saveImage

      public Boolean saveImage(android.content.Context context, android.widget.ImageView imageView)
      Saves the image displayed in the given ImageView to the device gallery.
      Parameters:
      context - the context used to access the ContentResolver
      imageView - the image view containing the bitmap to save
      Returns:
      true if the image was saved successfully; false otherwise

    • lookupEvent

      public void lookupEvent(String eventID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnSuccessListener<Event> callback)
      Finds the event object from an event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventID - the ID of the event to look up
      callback - the callback invoked with the found event or null
